name: Archaic Aliens
description:
This is the entry for my first jam, Godot Wild Jam #23

The theme is tiny worlds. Initial idea was to abduct cows, and dodge maybe bullets from men in black sorta agents  in tiny worlds. but I got thinking and thought of a deeper approach

So the idea is basically archaic aliens that help the building of earth. This involved a lot more research than I thought. So I had to search theories of  how actually it began and stuff . So this is a journey from  the beginning of earth.  

Cow abductions and men in black  might be a bit enjoyable now that I think about it. Maybe this can be fun for some folks too

Emjoy. and please do provide feedback. 

Also, I haven't checked out the mac and linux versions. do let me know if it works as it should. 

Thanks
